PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-10632022-10-07,  TC,  ,  , 
ActTransportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada Act
PrecisAppointment of GARY DROUIN of Chelsea, Quebec, to be a full-time member of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term ending on December 17, 2024; and his designation as Vice-Chairperson of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, for a term ending on December 17, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
